TopicTitle: Is Ultrasol (NPK 13-0-46) Potassium Nitrate okay to use as an oxidizer?

Articles.Content:
I just wanted to clarify does this ultrasol potassium nitrate (use for plant fertilizer) the same as the potassium nitrate we use as an oxidizer for sugar rockets? 
Link of the Ultrasol (NPK 13-0-46) Potassium Nitrate I plan to buy: https://shopee.ph/Ultrasol-(NPK-13-0-46)-Potassium-Nitrate-KNO3-200grams-1kg-i.41463246.5117228076?position=3
